law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 1, effective February 25, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2007 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 29, effective August 30, 2007. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, K, 11, (5) at 659.
metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008."
